title: Figment
description: Figment is an action-adventure game that invites you to explore a unique surreal universe filled with music, humor and multi layered narrative.

title: Sky Racket
description: Sky Racket is a game that mixes two classic genres from the Arcade era: Shoot’em up and Brick Breakers. In a world where you are unable to attack, using your racket to strike enemy bullets back at them is your only option! Bounce bullets back at your foes and save the galaxy!

title: Figment 2: Creed Valley
description: Figment 2: Creed Valley is an action-adventure game set in the human mind. Nightmares are spreading chaos and have overrun once-peaceful lands. Join Dusty, The Mind’s courage, as you make your way through puzzles, musical boss fights and unique environments.

title: Backpack Hero
description: The inventory management roguelike! Collect rare items, organize your backpack, and vanquish your foes!
